Comment 4: 
I forwarded this to Austin to see what he thinks.

It looks to me like Go cannot use make-syntax-table
for highlighting.  The implementation of the syntax-table
is written in C.  It looks all general but in fact it's just a 
C-or-Lisp tokenizer with knobs.  It doesn't have a concept
for strings without escape characters alongside strings
with escape characters.  FWIW, sh-mode doesn't
highlight `\` correctly either.
